channel.title: [PI] Sell amount?

item.title: [PI] Sell amount?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

How can I change the sell amount from 10 to a higher or lower number?

if(c.sellingN > c.getItems().getItemAmount(c.sellingId)) c.sellingN = c.getItems().getItemAmount(c.sellingId); int slot = -1; for(int x = 0; x < 10; x++){ if(c.playerShop[x] == 0){ slot = x; break; }

		for(int x = 0; x < 10; x++){
                              ^

Do I change this to the desired sell amount?

Read full topic
